remarks: There are no definable free ultrafilters in ZFC. However, there are free ultrafilters in some choice-denying constructions.  Here we show that given an amorphous set (a.k.a. a Ia-finite I-infinite set) ` X ` , the set of infinite subsets of ` X ` is a free ultrafilter on ` X ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-May-2015.)
